title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the File menu MRU list do not appear in subsequent sessions.
EB: The files in the File menu MRU list should be persisted between sessions.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open some files.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application.
5. Verify that the previously opened files are listed in the File menu MRU list.
